content.label: Some of the features don’t work, primarily the Valhalla ‘strength’ or Longhouse rewards don’t trigger after you sacrifice a character unless it is an immediate reward like VP but overall the game is a good combination of board game and digital format. The music, small animations are fun and bring the game to life without losing the charm and feel of the actual board game version. I’d like to see more small character animations for other cards like when the female warrior claps her shield as it really brings the character to life. Also please tweak or add more options to undo a choice mid selection or finesse the touchscreen capability as sometimes the app (or maybe it’s iPad/iOS?) selects the wrong item.  I also have Root and seriously you guys, digital wolf is the absolute best partner in bringing board games to life online. Now please tweak the perks, and add all the expansions. ;)

title.label: Great App, wish the expansions were available

content.label: Great App, wish the expansions were available

title.label: Recent update won’t let you play AI

content.label: Used to work well. After the recent update when I try to play the AI it asks me if I want to continue my previous game, don’t have one. But regardless both options crash the app. Making it unplayable.

title.label: Fun game but hard to play asynchronously

content.label: The gameplay and art are great. I enjoy the mechanics of the game even though it’s just the base game, no expansions. But trying to play asynchronously with three others is rough because notifications aren’t reliable and it takes waaaay too long to load the game even on a relatively modern device like an iPhone XR. The goal would be to open the game and complete a turn in a minute between other tasks, but the load time of 30-45 seconds makes that difficult.
The computer always seems to have the upper hand and always gains more of what ever is needed to win the game. Not what I call a good game.

title.label: Great game - up to a point...

content.label: The game is well designed and a lot of fun. However, when playing the campaign, I got stuck halfway thru. After completing the first two rounds, I could not advance past the third. I had saved the game about midway through the third round. When I went back to pick it up, the program would not let me load the saved game, it just got “stuck”. So I backed out and tried to start the game over, same result. If they fix this bug, my rating would probably go up.

I really love the game. I play by myself and with friends from across the country. Would love to be able to play the campaign scenarios more broadly. I’ve had a couple of glitches and the support function doesn’t work to get help. In general an app worth the price!
I can’t seem to play it. I have an iPhone 10 max and the game won’t go past the first screen. I rebooted the phone and let it run for 10 minutes and nothing. $10 poof gone.

title.label: Game is beautiful but multiplayer is buggy

content.label:
The game looks and generally plays really well... as long as you're solo. Playing online with friends connected whether through iOS or Steam is sub-optimal. It has crashed on all of us repeatedly and we can't rejoin the active game. It ruins the experience.

UPDATE: the developers responded to my review asking me to send an email to their support. I did and the EMAIL FAILED because their domain is offline. Get your act together, Direwolf.
An outstanding game that’s so cool I had buy the actual board game. The interface is alive and vibrant, and the gameplay is strategic and fun. My favorite iPad game in years.

Yeah I said it. With the music and animations, this app gives a better play experience than the physical game. 

The only things I’m hurting for are the digital expansions! I hope they’re in development 🤞🏽
Love the game!!

The game is good and plays very well if you just play solo or campaign. But the online game is a different story. I haven’t been able to finish any online game. It suddenly freezes and the game is over. Very frustrating. This game is not cheap and for that money I expect a product that works and I have fun with. Please improve the online experience.

Good adaptation. 

Needs adjustable AI difficulty for solo campaign play for casual players.
This app is great

This is one of my favorite board games of all time.  The app is just as fun as playing the tabletop version.  I am very impressed with it.  Now please please please make the expansions for this game, it would make it even more awesome.

title.label: Favorite digital adaptation of a board game

content.label: I love Raiders as a board game. It’s original take on worker placement and fantastic art make it a joy to play. The developers did a marvelous job with the app version. I’m hoping that they add the expansions soon, because I’ll be among the first to buy them. Thanks for the great work!
Good game fundamentally. Online version does not work. We tried many times and could not complete a game. Please debug!
The game just spins at the beginning and never actually loads.  Waste of $9.99

This is an ideal implementation of making a digital version of a board game. Well done! Can’t wait to see this developer finish the digital version of Root — another game I really want to play and think will be great digitally. Need any play testers for that effort?
Cannot get past the developers logos...

I love all the North Sea, and west kingdom games. But as an app it’s kind of horrible. Definitely not worth 10$. I really wanted to love it and put off buying it for a while because of the price. But playing the app just feels like a chore compared to other board game apps

title.label: Great Port of a Really Fun Game!

content.label: What a fun game this is!  It isn’t too heavy for iOS but is definitely not light either.  And I was pleasantly surprised that it hasn’t been too hard to find online opponents for async games!

But it is nigh near impossible to give them feedback. The in-game feedback feature always fails with an error saying you have a problem with your internet connection. And that crashes everything in the game. So I leave it at the error message telling me about my bad net connection and go to my other online games and none of them have any problems accessing my “bad” net connection. Obviously the game does something wrong internally.

I went to Renegade games and they had 3 ways to contact them. Twitter, Instagram, and email. I do not participate in either Instagram nor Twitter for personal reasons. That left email. Great. I select it and it brings up a list of email accounts. I select my icloud account and it wants my user is and apple id to login. I am reluctant, but figure I can reset my password once I leave my password, but they try to set up a new icloud account on my ipad which of course fails. I try again and it fails again. Fine.

I then use my other email provider, giving them my id and password along with the email’s server name. They can’t connect that way either. Jeimeny Chricket! 

My final try was a link to the game designer. I thought maybe I could get my feedback to him. But the link was bogus! It went to a non-existent page or a broken link. Thanks Renegade Games! This lack of wanting feedback on their part knocked my review from a 5 to a 3!

All this and I never even told you what my feedback about the game was going to be!

I played the board game version many times and I am a fan of the game. The app replicates the game perfectly and provides so much more.  The art, which is a huge part of the theme, is beautifully rendered.  Even more, the attention to detail adds to the thematic value as town buildings come to life when visited by a worker, your crew has a battle cry and the ships moving along the water simply put a smile on your face.  The campaign mode is very enjoyable.  Game flow is smooth as the app plays faster than the board version, which is great.  If you enjoy the board game, you should have this app.  Looking forward to seeing expansions!
So good! Take more of my money!!!

I bought this game having very high expectations. Yet, I could not even enter the game. I downloaded this game on my phone and iPad. Neither seemed to open after the initial screen. The wheel will just continuously spin. I had a gameplay report due on this game and could not complete it. Thanks.

title.label: Really great app, please add expansions

content.label:
Really great app. Only two suggestions to improve:

-add an Undo button for every action
-please add the expansions!!! I’d be willing to pay for an in app purchase for the expansions. Thanks!

I have played for a few days, and although the game is good, I can’t get over how often I have to crash the game and reopen it because it lagged or froze itself. I would expect this kind of behavior from a free game, but for a paid game it’s quite disappointing.

Love the game, but app really glitchy with 4p. 

Had issues sending feedback within it too. 

Casual games often disappear without explanation.
Spinning compass and no load of the game. Never got to play it. Company nonresponsive to email.

title.label: Love the game but crashes multiple times per game

content.label: Game is great and animations and sound effects are fun but the game repeatedly crashes to the point where the game is unplayable. I’d like a refund for this please.

I do love cardboard board games & iOS board games. This one is brilliant.  So easy to learn & so easy to understand.  Very nice graphics & sounds.  You’ve got a great big board game that you can play for as little or long as you like.  I can’t say thank you enough.  You nailed it & hit it out of the park. 
Great job Developers & thank you!
Spent the money, bought in to the hype, game won’t get passes loading screen. iPhone 11 Pro.

Updated review:
Could not play on phone but developer response helped fix issue.. a simple reboot of phone fixed it.
Tenho o board game físico e esta versão me surpreendeu positivamente. O modo campanha e a possibilidade de jogo solo (contra a IA) trazem novas opções. Recomendo!
I bought this game yesterday and have made several attempts to play it yet it never makes it past the screen with the developers logos..... super unhappy I paid for something I can’t even play.
i download this game，but couldnt get in。………
Just got an iphone 11 and bought this game and 30 seconds into the tutorial i find out i cannot activate nor drag my worker.

Wow.  Just wow.  I own a lot of board game apps and this is own and this one is not just eye candy but it has amazing gameplay.  Great port of a great game.  This game just raised the bar.  If Architects of the West Kingdom has the same quality, it will be an instant buy for many people.

title.label: Ignore my previous review rating of 1 star

content.label:
Problem fixed - needed to wipe iPad and restore from backup to solve Game Center issue.

Update: Game Center issue returned.  Devs were kind enough to give me a code to play on wife’s iPad.

In all fairness, Direwolf support responded multiple times to assist, and that alone makes the $10 worth it.  My original rating was 5 stars and I would’ve just corrected my recent warning but for some reason, Apple won’t let me in to my own review.  Typical of Apple.  Sigh....

Anyway, great game and yes, you can upgrade to iOS 13.  Seems my issue was not widely shared, probably just a corrupted install of iOS.

Enjoy the game and like he, pray they publish all the expansions and Architects!  😃
Great app, for a difficult worker-placement game! Hope they get the “Mead Hall” expansion added quickly. (The Jarls can wait, IMHO.)

title.label: Great digital port, missing basic features

content.label:
So the Shem Phillips and SJ Macdonald games are some of my all time favorites, and so far this seems like a pretty good port. Runs well, great graphics, and fairly intuitive. However, I am surprised this game is missing several basic features that should be standard in any digital board game port. 

1. You are unable to chose player color, the game just does it randomly 
2. You cannot add AI players to pass and play games. Please realize a major reason to use pass and play is that we are not having an actual game night but still want to play with more than two players. 
3. You cannot undo your entire turn. This is a huge faux pas as accidentally hitting something or choosing the wrong card/action is super common in digital board games
4. VP values are not displayed next to tracks (like in the real game). As a consequence you have trouble getting a sense of final scores

Please add in these features and easily 5 star port

I finally had a chance to play the board game at a convention last year in March and I LOVED it. It still lives on my wish list as I keep getting other things I think my fiancé will find more enjoyable as far as theme goes. When I saw this hit digital, I jumped on it, even at what I consider a premium price for an app. I’m not at all disappointed. 

The gameplay is so smooth, and all of the graphical touches and animations really bring the game to life. If it was just a straight digital version of the board game, that would be good, but the campaign mode, inclusion of online and pass and play send this over the top.

title.label: Absolutely incredible implementation, Online Bug breaks it

content.label:
Truly one of the best digital renderings of a game. Personally, Agricola is one of the best if you're looking for reference, as the world isn't just a board, but rather has actual living, moving, life-like breathing rhythm to it. Raiders is just like it, but with better art. The UI is buttery smooth, and pretty intuitive, so great job. (ok digital renderings include: through the ages, which just looks a little clunky, bad includes: scythe, terraforming mars pre-massive update)

However, not a 5⭐️ for 1 reason: somehow, a lot of the live games online fall out of sync, up to one player actually being able to finish the game while the other is starting at one player not taking their turn...when in fact, the entire game is occurring. Until they fix this, there's a 50-50 chance you're game is pointless. Considering how social gaming is, and how with iPad you can FaceTime and board game over distance, online play for digital games is really becoming hyper-critical. As soon as you fix this, this app will go in the hall of fame!

title.label: This is how you make an iOS board game

content.label: Runs smooth, fast start up, quick save, clear and bright graphics and sound, solid AI (after that update!), and of course the game mechanics are awesome in their own right. All I’m hoping now is we get the two expansions. Until then, play this game and get good, it’s worth your time!

The game is great. I’m definitely enjoying the digital adaptation. My only issue is there doesn’t seem to be badge notifications for the online play. Far too often I have to send or receive a text to figure out who’s turn it is. Seems like an easy fix, but what do I know. Would be 5 stars otherwise

title.label: The worker pickup bug seems to still exist.

content.label: I just downloaded this game today, and I couldn’t play through the first step of the tutorial because I couldn’t pick up a worker.
I am a big fan of the board game. They did a great job making this a mobile app. And the campaigns make for a fun way to play the game with different objectives. Great idea!

title.label: Great Implementation of a Smart Worker Placement

content.label:
I like the fancy graphics and the smooth drag and drop gameplay. The challenge mode was well done. The A.I. in normal mode gameplay could use a scalable difficulty as it’s a bit easy. Haven’t tried the pass-and-play yet, but glad to see it!
I’d like an easier way to see what each of the cards held in hand does, I can’t figure out how this can be done without “fake” playing the card and then undoing the action.
